column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Enter the 2-stars:  the cookie "delivery" was made by someone that was clearly the owner
column2: or at least some sort of hands-on manager.  That same person was hosting and chatting it up with 2 ladies that were seated directly behind me
column3: at the large bar that is in the middle of the bakery.  Employees would approach him with varying concerns and he directed them accordingly.  He stood while the ladies
column5: sat.  As I quickly peered at him
column6: I then noticed the open sore/wound that was on his elbow...While I don't think he kneeds bread with his elbow
column7: such was still uncomfortable and created a bit of a concern for sanitary conditions.  I toiled between mentioning it
column8: but I pride myself on being an honest Yelper.
